snippet.title: Dustland Delivery Early Access Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello Survivors! 
The Early Access of DUSTLAND DELIVERY will be released in "July 12, 2024 (Friday)".
 
| Game Introduction |
Dustland Delivery is a post-apocalyptic survival business simulator. You'll assemble a rag-tag band of adventurers, scour the wastes for business opportunities, and complete missions to grow your trading empire, allowing you to transform your settlement into the capital of the Dustlands. In short, your goal is to survive the end of the world—and turn a profit while you're at it.
 
🚚Click here for DUSTLAND DELIVERY Wishlist👉store.steampowered.com/app/2943280/Dustland_Delivery/
 
Don't forget to join our official community channel!
● Discord: discord.gg/H8jmU9VaeS
● X: x.com/Dustlandelivery
